alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:03AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Newton, northeastern Johnson and north central Pope Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 603 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boston, or 21 miles southeast of Huntsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillen... Moore... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Walnut... Bertha... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Ben Hur... Wayton... Mossville... Salus... Crossroad... Fallsville... Swain... Deer... Dixon Ridge... Cowell... Nail... Arbaugh... Sand Gap... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations
